targets.query:
from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Soc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "512")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "System")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "MaxCellVoltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "22")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: "Interior"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "Frequency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "System")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "MinCellVoltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "subfield"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Reverse" or r.detail == "Forward")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "Energy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with 
      _value: r._value / 1000.0,
      detail: if r.detail == "Forward" then "Import" else "Export"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "detail"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288" or r.instance == "512")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: if r.instance == "288" then "BMV" else "BMS"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Soc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "512")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: "BMS"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "L1" or r.subfield == "L2" or r.subfield == "L3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "subfield"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "L1" or r.subfield == "L2" or r.subfield == "L3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "subfield"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "L1" or r.subfield == "L2" or r.subfield == "L3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "subfield"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "grid")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "Frequency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288" or r.instance == "512")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: if r.instance == "288" then "BMV" else "BMS"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "288" or r.instance == "512")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: if r.instance == "288" then "BMV" else "BMS"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "System")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.subfield == "MaxCellVoltage" or r.subfield == "MinCellVoltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with subfield: if r.subfield == "MaxCellVoltage" then "Max" else "Min"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "subfield"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Dc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "StatusCode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "21")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "StatusCode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "23")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "StatusCode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "24")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "StatusCode")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.instance == "25")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pvinverter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Ac")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.detail == "Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: 
      if r.instance == "22" then "Interior"
      else if r.instance == "23" then "Exterior"
      else if r.instance == "24" then "TablouElectric"
      else r.instance
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: "Sensor " + r.instance}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])

from(bucket: "victron")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.field == "Pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with instance: "Sensor " + r.instance}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "instance"])
